You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesP P] > &pcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Pcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/041f/index.htm U+0041F].
  * `&pcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/043f/index.htm U+0043F].
